DOC.brief_summary: An Explorative Clinical Trial Evaluate Intra Patient Comparison Design Topical Agents Adults Mild Moderate Atopic Dermatitis .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Compare Topical Agents Adults With Mild Moderate Atopic Dermatitis ( AD )
DOC.detailed_description: Multi-center , prospective , randomize , vehicle-controlled , investigator-blinded , stable lesion design .
